#include<stdio.h>
bool gcd(int a,int b)
{
    int tmp;
if(a < b)
	{
	tmp = a;
		a = b;
		b = tmp;
	}
	//Find the gcd
	while(b != 0)
	{
		tmp = a % b;
		a = b;
		b = tmp;
	}
	if(a==1)
	{
	    return(1);
	}
	return(0);
}
int totient(int n)
{
    int k=1;
    for(int i=2;i<n;i++)
    {
        bool c=gcd(n,i);
        if(c)
        {
            k++;
        }
    }
    return(k);
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        int c=totient(n);
        printf("%d\n",c);
    }
}
